HeadComp.title: Customer Support Platform for your Business by MSG91-Philippines
HeadComp.description: HELLO is a robust omnichannel platform that empowers your customer support team. Deliver exceptional service experiences with data-driven insights.

Banner.heading: AI-powered Contact centre
Banner.subheading: Never lose sight of what’s important. Don’t just solve tickets, build customer relationships

features.name: Unify Every Conversation, Empower Every Team
features.subtitle: Seamless Multichannel Inbox for Your Business
features.content: Bring together all your customer conversations—across WhatsApp, Email, Instagram, Facebook, Website, and more—into one easy-to-use, centralized platform. No more juggling tabs, forwarding messages, or letting customer inquiries slip through the cracks. With Hello, your teams (from sales to customer service) collaborate effortlessly, handle every sales lead, customer support request, or feedback together, and never lose track of a single customer.

features: Enjoy an all-in-one message view for every channel you use and keep every conversation chatbot at your fingertips.
Assign and prioritize conversations to the right team members with one click.
Effortlessly search, filter, and tag communications for instant context using intelligent chatbots.
Keep complete customer histories at your fingertips.

features.footer: Achieve next-level collaboration and customer visibility, unifying every channel for seamless service. Your teams work as one, with instant access to rich customer context—empowering proactive support and meaningful engagement at scale.

features.name: Connect, Engage, and Convert Instantly
features.subtitle: Chat Widget That Converts—From First Hello to Lasting Loyalty
features.content: Hello’s live chat widget sits right on your website, becoming the instant bridge between your business and curious visitors. Customers can chat, share files, leave voice notes, or even switch to a voice call—all without leaving your page, enabled by artificial intelligence.

features: Website visitors start a chat or call with just one click
Escalate complex queries from chat to voice call, seamlessly with an AI Voice Agent
Fully customizable widget to match your brand and workflow for every AI Chatbot journey
Reduce bounce rates, capture more leads, and create memorable first impressions

features.name: Handle Even the Toughest Calls with Ease
features.subtitle: Voice Bot and IVR Automation That Never Sleeps
features.content: Deliver world-class telephony and voice support. With Hello’s advanced AI Voice Agent, every caller is greeted, guided, and helped—without wait times or misrouted calls.

features: Multi-level menus and custom call flows direct callers to the perfect agent or department
Play personalized greetings and collect critical information up front
Record calls for training, compliance, or quality assurance
Easily integrates with your customer service software crm and helpdesk for context-rich conversations
Dramatically reduce hold times while maintaining a warm, branded voice experience

features.name: Reply Smarter and Faster—Every Time
features.subtitle: AI-Powered Smart Suggestions for Human-Like Support
features.content: With SmartCue AI built-in, every customer interaction is elevated. Agents receive instant, context-aware reply suggestions that are professional, empathetic, and tailored to each chat through the power of artificial intelligence capabilities. This not only accelerates response times, but also ensures consistent, on-brand communication, even for new team members.

features: Intelligent, ready-to-send replies at your fingertips
Reduce typing fatigue and cut training time for new agents.
Spots clarity issues to support agents in delivering perfect responses.

features.footer: Your agents become super-agents—delivering quick, consistent customer care at scale through intelligent chatbots.

features.name: Speak Their Language—Break Barriers, Build Trust
features.subtitle: Global Multilingual Messaging Made Simple
features.content: Don’t let language limit your reach. Hello’s multilingual messaging breaks down borders, automatically translating every customer chat in real time—letting your team reply in any language, effortlessly.

features: Bi-directional translations in over 100 global and regional languages
Customers chat, ask, and buy in their preferred language
Your team expands internationally — no added staff or language training needed

features.name: Keep Support Flowing, Even at Scale
features.subtitle: Advanced Ticket Management and Effortless Automation
features.content: Every support ticket is more than a message—it’s a chance to impress. With Hello, incoming queries are auto-sorted by urgency, topic, or customer profile, ensuring the right person handles each situation. Set smart rules so common issues are solved by bots; complex ones are prioritized or escalated in real time by your customer support automation system.

features: Route tickets by skill, department, or VIP status
Auto-resolve repetitive issues, freeing up agent time with specialized chatbots
Trigger escalations and actions based on custom logic
Scale seamlessly from dozens to thousands of requests per day

features.name: Get the Full Picture, Instantly
features.subtitle: Advanced Analytics Dashboard for Smarter Decisions
features.content: Unlock actionable insights into everything happening across your communication channels. Hello’s analytics dashboard gives you real-time stats on message volumes, agent performance, response times, first contact resolutions, customer service satisfaction, and more. Visualize your entire operation with graphs and dynamic reports supported by artificial intelligence.

features: Track SLAs, sentiment scores, and agent productivity
Identify issues, top performers, and growth opportunities
Export and share actionable insights across your business

features.name: Work Without Limits—Wherever You Are
features.subtitle: Mobile App That Puts Customer Conversations in Your Pocket
features.content: Never miss a customer, even on the go. With Hello’s fully featured mobile app (iOS and Android), your team receives instant notifications, replies to chats, assigns cases, and can even start calls—all with the security and reliability of your main platform.

features: Real-time push alerts for every new customer message
Access full feature set—chat, calls, assignment, histories—anywhere
Secure and reliable, built for mobile workforces
Perfect for traveling reps, remote agents, and business owners on the move

features.name: Create Conversations That Sell—Checkout Without the Hassle
features.subtitle: Chat-to-Checkout: Boost Revenue Directly from Chat
features.content: Turn any customer conversation into a transaction! With Hello, customers browse, select, and purchase right inside your chat widget or WhatsApp window. Display interactive product cards, real-time inventory, and instant “add to cart” or payment buttons—so every inquiry can become a sale.

features: Showcase products and variants, with live inventory
Integrated payment gateway for smooth, secure checkout
Track orders from conversation to delivery
No links, no redirects, zero drop-offs—just conversions

features.name: Automated, Always-On Support That Scales With You
features.subtitle: No-Code AI Chatbot Builder for Effortless Automation
features.content: Empower your business with 24/7 instant responses and automated actions—no coding required. Hello’s drag-and-drop chatbot builder lets you design custom flows for FAQs, lead capture, appointment booking, and more. Launch powerful bots that scale your customer service, drive sales, and qualify leads around the clock.

features: Build and deploy chatbots in minutes—no technical skills needed
Automate common tasks and workflows, freeing up live agents
Integrate with CRMs, calendars, and payment gateways
Continuously improve bots with analytics and feedback

features.name: Route Queries to the Right Agent Every Time
features.content: Hello gives you total control over your customer support process. As an admin, you can set custom roles and assign specialized permissions—so agents focus only on what they do best, whether that’s operations, sales, or support. Every message goes to the right expert, and you can track every action for full accountability.

features: Set team or user roles and permissions
Specialize agent access by function
Smart assignment—by channel, expertise, or round robin

features.name: Automated, Always-On Support That Scales With You
features.subtitle: No-Code AI Chatbot Solution for Every Channel
features.content: Empower your brand to provide instant support day or night—at scale. Hello’s intuitive drag-and-drop ai chatbot maker lets anyone create and launch highly-capable chatbots on WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook, your website, or more. Collect leads, answer FAQs, process orders, and hand off to humans when needed.

features: Visual bot builder: Create flows without coding
Multichannel deployment in minutes
Multilingual support and seamless escalation
Available 24/7—delivering answers, leads, and happy customers

features.name: Screen Control
features.content: Control your customer’s screen from where you are. Work on the remote screen as if you are really there. Once you get access, get complete control of your customer’s screen, mouse and keyboard to quickly resolve issues.

faqs.question: How to subscribe to your Hello Plan.
faqs.answer:
In the Hello panel, click on the subscription tab, that is available on the left corner. It will open the page of the current plan and also the option to purchase a new plan. Click on that and you will be able to select from monthly and yearly options
 You can directly subscribe to the plan from the website itself. There go to Hello Service click on Get Started, fill in the necessary details, and subscribe to the plan.

faqs.question: Are there any charges for AI chatbots?
faqs.answer:
No, there are no charges for Chat Bot, we are only charged for basic and premium plans. You can use the chatbot in a free plan till 50 tickets in Hello, after that you have to upgrade your Hello plan. Basically, we are providing the chatbot free for Trial purposes.
 You can use this Chat Bot in WhatsApp, Instagram, Chat Widget on your Website, Facebook and so on. So test the Chat Bot Now.

faqs.question: Are there any extra charges for Instagram/ Facebook  Inbox?
faqs.answer:
You can use inboxes that are available in your Hello Plan for Instagram or Whatsapp. The number of inboxes assigned in each plan.

  • Free Plan- 2 inboxes
  • Basic Plan- 2 inboxes
  • Premium Plan- 3 inboxes

But in case you already have used the assigned inboxes you can always purchase a new inbox in basic and premium plan for rupees 500 each.

In case of a free plan you won't be able to purchase new inboxes. You have to upgrade the plan if you want the extra inbox.

faqs.question: What are the charges for tickets and extra tickets in Hello?
faqs.answer:
We are providing monthly tickets with each plan and in case they end, you can also use extra tickets which you pay in postpaid billing.

Here are the number of tickets assigned in each plan:

  • Free Plan- 50 tickets/monthly
  • Basic Plan- 1000 tickets/monthly
  • Premium Plan- 2000 tickets/monthly

Extra Charges for each ticket in different plans:

  • Free Plan- there is no option for more tickets in free plans as you have to upgrade the Hello Plan to Basic or Premium as per your choice.
  • Basic Plan- ₹0.5 per ticket
  • Premium Plan- ₹0.75 per ticket

faqs.question: Can I customize the Hello Plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can have a customized plan for hello. Click on the link to schedule the meeting with the sales heads.

PreFooterComp.content: Start building your ideal customer engagement experience
